maqras.text: Mata eien no shonen-tachi ga kare-ra no ma o 往米 Shi, anata ga kare-ra o miru to, maki chirasa reta shinjudearu to omoudearou
Anata wa shisen o mukeru to shifuku no sodaina sangoku o shitatamerudearou
Kare-ra wa utsukushi midoriiro no kinu to nishiki no soto i o matoi, gin no udewa de kazara re,-nushi wa kare-ra ni junryona nomimono o noma se rareru
Hontoni kore wa anata gata ni taisuru hoshodearu. Anata gata no doryoku ga uke haira reta nodearu.'(To ose rareyou)
Ware koso wa, dankai o o tte anata ni kuruan o kudashita monodearu
Dakara (dendo ni sen'nen shi), anata no omo no shinpan o taeshinonde mate. Kare-ra no naka no tsumi aru mono ya, fushinjin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai
Asanayuna, anata no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi nasai
Soshite yoru no ichibu o kare ni sajida shi, choya no shijima ni, kare o tatae nasai
Hontoni korera no mono wa, tsukanoma no seikatsu o aishi, judaina-bi o haigo ni sutesaru
Kare o tsukuri, sono shishi o kataku baku gi tometa no wa ware deru. Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra to ruiji no soto no mono de oki kaeru koto mo dekiru nodearu
Hontoni kore wa hitotsu no kunkaidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono ni wa, kare no omo e no michi o tora se nasai
Daga arra ga o nozomi ni naranakereba, anata gata wa hosshinaidearou. Arra wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru
Kare wa, o kokoronikanau-sha o jihi ni yoku sa se, mata fugi no to ni taishite wa tsuretsuna chobatsu o sonae rareru
Tsugitsugini okura reru kaze ni oi te
Moi o fu u kaze ni oi te
Ame o motarasu kaze ni oi te
Shinri to kyogi o kubetsu suru (kuruan no) keiji ni oi te
Keiji o yogen-sha-tachi ni tsutaeru tenshi-tachi ni oite (chikau)
Arra kara no o satoshi to keikoku to shite (tsutaete iru)
(Makka no haishin-sha yo. ) Anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta koto (fukkatsu no hi to chobatsu) ga tashika ni okoru
Moroboshi ga kesa reru toki
ten ga sake chiru toki
yamayama ga chiri no yo ni hakobi sara reru toki
shito-tachi ga sadame rareta toki ni shoshu sa reru toki
(sorera wa) itsu no hi made yuyo sa reta no ka
Sabaki no hi madedearu
Sabaki no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Ware wa (akugyo no tame ni) zendai no mono o horobosanakatta ka
Sonogo ware wa, kodai no mono ni kare-ra o tsuga setade wanai ka
Kono yo ni ware wa tsumi no aru-sha-tachi o jobunsuru
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Ware wa anata gata o iyashi mizu kara tsukuttade wanai ka
Ware wa sore o, antaina yasumi-sho (shikyu) ni oita
sadame rareta jiki made
Ware wa so sadameta. Waga kettei no nanto yoi koto yo
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Ware wa, daichi o okina yoki to shinakatta ka
seizon-sha to shisha (soho no tame ni)
Sono-jo ni yamayama o takaku sobie sase, mata Shin 鮮Na mizu o anata gata ni noma setade wanai ka
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
(Ose rareyou. ) `Omomuke, anata gataga usodearu to itte kita tokoro (jigoku) e
Omomuke, anata gata 3ttsu no eda (ni tachi noboru kemuri) no in ni
Soreha kage ni mo narazu, mata moesakaru hono ni taishite wa yakunitatanaidearou
Soreha (kyodaina) toride no yona hono o haki
chodo (kyohon suru) kokasshoku no rakuda no yo
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Sore wa, hatsugen suru koto ga dekinai hideari
mata moshi-biraki mo, kare-ra ni yurusarenaidearou
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Sore wa sabaki no hideari, ware wa anata gata mo (anata gata) izen no mono-tachi mo, issho ni atsumeru
Anata gata ni nanika jussaku ga aru nonara, ware ni mukatte sakubo suruga i
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Omo o osoreru mono wa, hontoni (suzushi) kage to izumi no ma ni irudarou
Kare-ra ga hossuru, subete no kajitsu (o eru)
Kokoronosokokara manzoku shite tabe katsu nome, anata gata (no yoi) okonai o shita koto ni taishite.'(To ware wa iou)
Kono yo ni ware wa, yoi okonai no mono-tachi ni mukuiru
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
(Anata gata fugi no mono yo. ) `Shibashi no ma tabe katsu kyoraku suruga i. Hontoni anata gata wa tsumibukaimonodearu
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Kare-ra wa,`ritsurei 〔rukuu〕 seyo.' To iwa rete mo ryurei shinai
(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu
Kono (kuruan) o sashioite, don'na oshie o kare-ra wa shinjiyou to suru no ka
